data.title: Cuneyt Oge - Securing America's Future

data.text:
PRESIDENT, SAE INTERNATIONAL

Cuneyt Oge is the 2016 President and Chair of the Board of Directors of SAE International and a member of the Board of Directors of DeltaWing Technologies. He also serves as a management consultant and advisor to clients in the Automotive industry.

Mr. Oge retired as a Partner from PWC’s PRTM Management Consulting business at the end of 2013 following more than 34 years of experience working with businesses in North America, Europe, and South America improve their strategy and operations.

Mr. Oge is the founder of PRTM Management Consulting’s Automotive, Aerospace, Industrial Business Group which became a major component of the firm’s business. He has consulted extensively in the automotive, aerospace, industrial, electronics, and energy sectors. In recent years, he has been active in the emerging clean technology and electric vehicle industries.

Prior to joining PRTM, he was a vice-president of A. T. Kearney’s automotive practice and a consultant with Booz Allen Hamilton’s automotive practice. Before becoming a consultant he worked for the Olin Chemical Corporation.

He is a graduate of the University of Massachusetts where he obtained his BS degree in industrial management and his MS degree in industrial engineering and operations research. Mr. Oge also spent time at Stanford University’s Graduate School of Business doing post-graduate research on product development management.

Mr. Oge is an Emeritus member of the SAE Foundation Board. He is a frequent speaker on globalization, product strategy and technology management, has published numerous articles on these subject areas, and speaks several languages.
